name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot with a nostalgic charm. Its body resembles a classic console, complete with retro buttons, while its arms and legs take the form of adorable cat paws. The screen displays a striking red and black pattern, reminiscent of old-school oscilloscope displays. RetroBot is a proud member of the WebtrES club, an online community of technology enthusiasts.
